Title: Establishes a report on arts and music education in elementary and secondary schools to study and make recommendations on the curriculum and time spent on arts and music education
Summary: Establishes a report on arts and music education in elementary and secondary schools to study and make recommendations on the curriculum and time spent on arts and music education.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish a report on arts and music education in elementary and secondary schools; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
